Summary: The object was in cloud form but when i got home it took a different form after recording the event.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around July 10th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking through the corn fields in my local town Tipton in the evening at about 7pm. It was a clear evening and very warm. As a matter of coincidence i looked up, i dont know what made me look up though. I then saw a cloud, or which i thought was a cloud. It took the shape of a cloud but had black spots all over which i thought was very irregular. So as it happended i had my video camera and filmed it. I kept the video rolling until it was out of sight. During the event i was that overwhelmed by what i saw i began shivering and had sharp pains in my stomach during the event which lasted all of about 2 minutes. Another strange thing was the object just totally vanished, and this is when i headed straight back home. When i got home and i played it back through my video recorder i had a shock at what i saw. It was like a missile, it had no tail with very small wings, hardly visible at the front.
